org.apache.flink.runtime.state

类 AbstractHeapState<K,N,SV,S extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.State,SD extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.StateDescriptor<S,?>,Backend extends AbstractStateBackend>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.state.AbstractHeapState<K,N,SV,S,SD,Backend>
  • 类型参数:
    K - The type of the key.
    N - The type of the namespace.
    SV - The type of the values in the state.
    S - The type of State
    SD - The type of StateDescriptor for the State S
    Backend - The type of the backend that snapshots this key/value state.
    所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.flink.api.common.state.State, KvState<K,N,S,SD,Backend>
    直接已知子类:
    AbstractFsState, AbstractMemState

    public abstract class AbstractHeapState<K,N,SV,S extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.State,SD extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.StateDescriptor<S,?>,Backend extends AbstractStateBackend>
extends Object
implements KvState<K,N,S,SD,Backend>, org.apache.flink.api.common.state.State
    Base class for partitioned ListState implementations that are backed by a regular heap hash map. The concrete implementations define how the state is checkpointed.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected K currentKey
      The current key, which the next value methods will refer to
      protected N currentNamespace
      The current namespace, which the access methods will refer to.
      protected Map<K,SV> currentNSState
      Cache the state map for the current key.
      protected org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.TypeSerializer<K> keySerializer
      The serializer for the keys
      protected org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.TypeSerializer<N> namespaceSerializer
      The serializer for the namespace
      protected HashMap<N,Map<K,SV>> state
      Map containing the actual key/value pairs
      protected SD stateDesc
      This holds the name of the state and can create an initial default value for the state.
      protected org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.TypeSerializer<SV> stateSerializer
      Serializer for the state value.

      Creates a new empty key/value state.

      Creates a new key/value state for the given hash map of key/value pairs.

      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void clear() 
      void dispose()
      Disposes the key/value state, releasing all occupied resources.

      Gets the serializer for the namespace.

      Sets the current key, which will be used when using the state access methods.
      void setCurrentNamespace(N namespace)
      Sets the current namespace, which will be used when using the state access methods.
      protected int size()
      Returns the number of all state pairs in this state, across namespaces.

    • 字段详细资料

      • state

        protected final HashMap<N,Map<K,SV>> state
        Map containing the actual key/value pairs

      • stateSerializer

        protected final org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.TypeSerializer<SV> stateSerializer
        Serializer for the state value. The state value could be a List, for example.

      • keySerializer

        protected final org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.TypeSerializer<K> keySerializer
        The serializer for the keys

        The serializer for the namespace

      • stateDesc

        protected final SD extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.StateDescriptor<S,?> stateDesc
        This holds the name of the state and can create an initial default value for the state.

        protected K currentKey
        The current key, which the next value methods will refer to

        The current namespace, which the access methods will refer to.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • AbstractHeapState

        protected AbstractHeapState(org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.TypeSerializer<K> keySerializer,
                            org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.TypeSerializer<N> namespaceSerializer,
                            org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.TypeSerializer<SV> stateSerializer,
                            SD stateDesc)
        Creates a new empty key/value state.
        参数:
        keySerializer - The serializer for the keys.
        namespaceSerializer - The serializer for the namespace.
        stateDesc - The state identifier for the state. This contains name and can create a default state value.

      • AbstractHeapState

        protected AbstractHeapState(org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.TypeSerializer<K> keySerializer,
                            org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.TypeSerializer<N> namespaceSerializer,
                            org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.TypeSerializer<SV> stateSerializer,
                            SD stateDesc,
                            HashMap<N,Map<K,SV>> state)
        Creates a new key/value state for the given hash map of key/value pairs.
        参数:
        keySerializer - The serializer for the keys.
        stateDesc - The state identifier for the state. This contains name and can create a default state value.
        state - The state map to use in this kev/value state. May contain initial state.
